text:
EBET Group of Institutions, Kangayam, has announced a two-day faculty programme on research methods on February 5 and 6. The programme to be addressed by P. Murugan, National Institute of Technology - Tiruchi, could be attended free of cost by scholars pursuing M.Phil / Ph.D.

For registration, contact

R. Sivakumar, Professor, over phone 98426 22225

or email: rs.fom@ebet.edu.in
title: TAMIL NADU
